English:
Fully automatic
Medium to long range
Low firerate
Description: A short description of the characteristics of a weapon and its ammunition.

Automatique
Moyenne à longue portée
Faible cadence de tir

Gittata da media a lunga

Medio a largo alcance
Cadencia de tiro baja

Низкая скорострельность

Baixa cadência de tiros

Średni i długi dystans
